snippet: There are too many unqualified voters and too many segments of the baseball world with no say in the process.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column calls for change in Baseball Hall of Fame's induction process, claiming that there are too many unqualified voters and too many segments of the baseball world with no say in the process.
lead_paragraph: There are too many unqualified voters and too many segments of the baseball world with no say in the process.

headline.seo: Baseball Hall of Fame Voting Process Must Change – Tyler Kepner
headline.main: A Voting Process Overdue for Reform
headline.print_headline: A Voting Process Overdue for Reform
